smac.model

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • smac.model.Rule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Rule>

    public class Rule
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Rule>
    Rule class defines a rule which is used by the SMAC daemon to route an incoming message to an outgoing queue.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Bishan Kumar Madhoo
